text: It's a rule on these premises. No treating with strangers - that's right, John, isn't it?
handwritten_text: My fault entirely, said the stranger. that you both knew who I was. I'm Ian Bawley. Does that mean anything to you? It did. Ian Bawley's name was printed at the head of most naval articles in the Daily Courier. It'sa quean there premise.N trealing With. Haneen-tlat', right-Jolin, sn'A it?
name: Ian Bawley
